com.mlt.db

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.db.Condition

  • public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
    A condition used to build filtering criteria.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • literal

        public static Condition literal(java.lang.String condition)
        Creates a literal condition that is responsibility of the developer to be correct. This condition can not be checked on the fly, only the RDBMS can check it when sent.
        Parameters:
        condition - The expression condition.
        Returns:
        The condition.
